storyInfo: Back in the city, Saria takes the Doctor and Mechanist to a bar to meet a former scientist, only to get a stern warning. At the test site, Silence notes some similarities between the experiments there and her past with the Diαbolic Experiments.

attributes.content: This smell is familiar...
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Too bad there's still work to be done. I miss the sensation of alcohol rushing through my body.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: You're listening to Blaze, huh?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: She's always complaining about all the rumors there are about her, and complaining that I take things too rough in her weapon test sessions.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: 'Machine oil' is the name of my favorite cocktail.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Regular patrons of Just One More Pint know it well.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: If you want to dig deep into those kinds of rumors, Doctor, take Blaze up on it next time she invites you to drink.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Logos and the others will—
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Let's just say that what you see will make you forget any rumors about me.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Have you found your man, Saria?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: He spends twenty hours a day here.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Two Trimounts Sunshines, please.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You don't look like someone who drinks during work hours.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I'm not.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I've never been one to let alcohol interfere with my brain, regardless of the hour.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Live a little, Saria.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Both of these are yours.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: And you'd better pull yourself together, because I'm not buying a third.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: What? Have you gone homeless too, after leaving Rhine?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: How many drinks I'm willing to buy for you depends on how much your information is worth to me.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Well then, spit it out. What do you want to know?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: See the liquid in this test tube?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Hm? Hmm...
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: It's not for drinking.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Well then, why are you asking me?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Show me your right hand.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: What are you doing?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: You're right-handed, but you're holding the glass with your left.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Does your right arm still hurt from the subdermal Arts Unit implant?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The what?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Saria...
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Who's the helmet, and the hood?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Rhine Engineering? Volvort Kochinski? Maybe... one of those places whose name we dare not speak?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Did they change their minds? Decide to shut me up forever?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: I promise you, I have nothing to do with any of the organizations you mentioned. Not now, not ever.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Promise? Words like that ain't even worth the booze in front of me.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Doctor, he may not be willing to talk with us here.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: It's you I don't trust, especially not that getup.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: You reek of the Columbian tech elite, know what I mean?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: The hood can stay. I feel better about you.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Alright, I'll be over there.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Saria, you've picked up so many tabs for me, let me give you some honest advice.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Don't dig any deeper, if you don't want to end up like me.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: This test tube of yours, that power armor—you're biting off more than you can chew.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Yes, more than even you can chew.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Do you understand what it is you've just said?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: It was you who reminded me. I'm not senile yet.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: This is a very serious accusation.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Is it now? An accusation?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Oh, the accusation that you have something to do with Muelsyse's disappearance? Or the one that you're trying to seize control of Rhine Lab?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: You need stronger evidence than that to blackmail me.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Relax, old friend.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: How long have we worked together? Ten years and then some?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Did you think I was the type to come chat with an old friend carrying a bunch of papers, voice recordings and legal drafts?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Just because you did it to me doesn't mean I intend to return the favor.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Columbians like to put everything on the negotiating table. But you forget, I'm a cunning old Leithanian goat, who likes to play dumb.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: What exactly do you want?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Just passing by, and to encourage an old friend.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I don't understand. I thought you were on Control's side.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You don't understand? We're researchers, after all. There's always more we don't understand than we do. That's part of the fun.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: You're a lot like Kirsten. Too young, and too smart.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: You're always trying to fly high, not realizing how difficult it is for the others to keep up with you.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: All I want is to be left in peace to do my research, and not be dragged along the ground.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: It may only take a couple of years of your administration for the military and big capital to pick Rhine Lab to the bone, but it won't happen tomorrow.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I'm surprised you have such a high opinion of me.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You'll need to deal with the Director of Defense first, however, in order to get to Kirsten.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I didn't think Defense had a director.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Look at you, your memory failing at such a tender age.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Kirsten never accepted Saria's resignation.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I never understood how you think, Saria.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: No one talks about that ever since everything went down at Loken... my old employer.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: They all chose to cut ties, no matter how much or how little they knew about the experiments.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: That's what smart people do.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Does that mean you're not smart?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Ha... tongue still as sharp as ever, huh?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: I would run if I could. They won't let me.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: You ask if my right hand hurts? Of course it does! But did you think they would let me live this long if I didn't give up my hand and become a test subject?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: I was the goddamned surgeon! Even if I had no idea what they wanted me to implant!
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Still capable of anger, I see. Looks like alcohol hasn't completely numbed you.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You've changed, Saria.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: I could see you were angry when you first came to me, a few years ago.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You weren't exactly wearing it on your face.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: But I could see it. I felt the same way, when I learned what kind of experiments I was involved in.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: There are other ways, if you want to take down Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: You're one of the founders. Anybody after Rhine will be queueing up to take your hand.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Taking down Rhine won't solve anything.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Kill one beast, only for its flesh and blood to feed yet more beasts. The fall of Loken Watertank is proof.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Excuses.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: You've gone all over the place for Rhine. You're opposed to them on the surface, but what you're actually doing is cleaning up their messes.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: When I saw you, I knew the rumors were true.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: You were willing to go to jail for Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.options: The Mansfield incident?;Sounds right, but something feels off...

attributes.content: Not the smartest thing to deal in rumors.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The fall of HydeBro was a headache for the Director of Energy, wasn't it?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: The loss of a key supplier has thrown a wrench into his requests for a new laboratory site. He lost a few major orders, didn't he?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: It was a setback to whatever experiments he had going on.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: It wasn't me who sent the Hyde brothers to jail.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You played a big part.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: I know the rules. With the Hyde brothers locked up, the prosecutors no doubt wanted to use them to hook bigger fins.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Why was there no mention of Rhine Lab in the news? Why does Rhine always emerge unscathed from these things?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: The truth is you've been following the trail, cleaning up all Rhine's little mistakes left along the way.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: That's why you came looking for me...
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: You wanted to know whether or not Rhine had anything to do with this reagent.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Deep down, you're still the Rhine's Director of Defense. You still think it's your job to pick up after them.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: There's something at Rhine that you can't let go of. Or maybe it's someone. Some sentiment.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Ha, looks like you do have emotions after all, Saria!
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: At the end of the day, we're all flesh and blood.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: The subject is out of control!
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Restraints have failed!
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Not getting any neural signals from the subject! Attempting sedative injection... negative!
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: The subject is activating Originium Arts!
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Section Employee

attributes.content: A monster... it's a huge monster...
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Section Employee

attributes.content: No, the flames are manifesting...
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Section Employee

attributes.content: Get the Director on the line, now!
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Section Employee

attributes.content: Fire... the fire... cough...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Ifrit, where are you...?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Ifrit!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Saria...?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: She felt no heat in the fiery corridor.
The eyes of the Vouivre were harder than rock, colder than steel.
She could not read the emotions within them.
To this day, she does not know what she saw in the Vouivre's eyes.
Are you okay, Doc Silence?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You've gotta be tired.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You've been taking care of Doc Moore, and the rest of us.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I'm wicked sorry I acted like that, and almost got you hurt.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Rhodes Island isn't like Rhine Lab. You and Greyy have been so good to us, and you never asked for nothing for it.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Is that true?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm no saint, Sonny.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I was a Rhine Lab researcher. My experiments almost wiped out an entire city block, countless people along with it...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: There was a girl. She was close to me... almost like family.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: She was the subject of the experiment.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What happened to her?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: She's still alive.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But only alive. All these years, I've tried and failed to give her back the life she should have had, a normal life.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But I couldn't stop the situation from deteriorating.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Don't blame yourself. I'm sure you never meant to hurt her.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Ha... haha...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Funny, that's how I comforted myself in the past.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I didn't know. It was others who were truly to blame.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But was that really so?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: As the overseer in the field, did I really not know the risks of our research?
The answer is clear.
Either I was blinded by the tantalizing promise of a breakthrough...
Or I was far less a researcher than I thought I was.
And that's harder to do than to hate someone else.
Perhaps the one I truly could not forgive was...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I never knew your story.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: It's more than just a story. It's why I came here.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Aren't you trying to save your friend?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Of course, I have to save Joyce.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But I want to save you, and Elena, and Director Franks.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I want to stop all this, before we get to the point of no return.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You believe me?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Like I said, I believe in the truth, in what I see for myself.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And I recall that I've seen something like it.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The silver things following us—they look like the result of Originium Arts gone awry.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: By the way, I had Ben bring you something. It should be on your desk now.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Ben?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You forgot again? You told him to have tea with me. He talked so much that he nearly drank my entire stash.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I don't remember you owing me anything.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Oh? That wasn't what you said when I'd just completed my chimeric organism experiments.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: The Diαbolic Experiments.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Glad you remember.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: My student used an anesthetic of her own design during the final phase.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: To shocking results.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Silence was such a smart girl. I miss her.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: After the project was suspended, I reviewed the data logs and found that it was no coincidence.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: What data?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You're not the only one who digs through the trash.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: You mean Loken Watertank? Those data were...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Let's not dwell on clerical matters, shall we?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Loken Williams was a genius. Reviewing his data made me realize that I was taking the long way round.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I was trying to increase the subject's cell activity, in order to increase sync rate with the energy contained within the embedded shards.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Who would have thought that suppressing the subject's neural responses would be the way to go?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Suppress?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I made some small changes to your formula based on this conjecture.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I hope you'll forgive the initiative.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: You're a sly one, old goat.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Why the irritation? I simply offered a gift before you asked for it.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Is it really so disappointing to lose a weapon against me?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: It had better be of use to my experiments.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I promise you'll like it.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Oh, and if you're successful, could you pick up the tab on the ten boxes of black bean tea that Muelsyse owes me?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I would have won that bet, if not for my formula.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Back on topic.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The reagent.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I had a sniff when you took it out.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Yes, it's the exact same smell.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Ha, it's the ghosts of the ones who died on my operating table, back to haunt me.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Thicker and more numerous...
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Who?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Who, you ask?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Who salvaged the most from the ruins of Loken Watertank?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Time to go home, Saria.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: See, you knew the answer all along.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: You already met the Tin Man. He helped you find me.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Who was the main sponsor of the Diαbolic Experiments? Who was Loken Watertank's investor?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Who had the means to hire multiple labs to engage in similar experiments at the same time?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: How irresistible did the order have to be, to make those labs put their petty patent feuds aside and sit down to share data?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: And...
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Whose hands did the surviving subjects pass through before they were sent out of Columbia?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Looks like a pretty lively conversation.
I hope I didn't miss too much.
